descriptionHtml:
Please read:

First of all, I want to thank the awesome Robin Scott (clayman67) for giving me permission to post this mod, as he is the one making the original "Explosive Chickens" mod where I took the explosive effect from, which is totaly awesome, and you should check it out!

---> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17427/ <---

Explosions! EVERYWHERE!!
But, truly, this mod makes every npc in game go boom when dead. May Sheogorath be with you! Have fun, and don't forget the cheese!

[youtube]_5PT5nHnDo24[/youtube]

Most of the common creature npc's are already rigged, but there's still alot of creatures left to add the explosive effect on, so this is still in WiP.


To do list:
-----------------------------------
* Make all npc's explosive at death
* Fix bugs if found
author: WarUlv
